extension.news: MirrorV2 has been improved under the hood and the settings are more extensive and clearer. Extra options such as: TVMaze, TVDb, Metadata, Multisources choice. IMDb and TBDb Trakt lists and more can be found under TV shows and Movies. In the settings menu you can turn things off as desired.
